name: Monster&Strategy
description:
* Program generated dungeons
The monsters, resources, roads and exits generated by the program, they are hidden in the fog waiting for exploration.

* Various monsters
Monsters with different abilities are distributed everywhere in the dungeon, block the road and guarding treasures. They are randomly combined and become a potential threat.

* Powerful BOSS
There are several powerful bosses in the game, and when you keep getting stronger, you will be targeted by them, please be careful.

* Evolving content
As you go deeper, these monsters will evolve into more advanced forms, and can receive random ability. The dungeon will also become bigger and more dangerous.

* Abundant deck forge
Use hundreds of cards with different functions and dozens of unique treasures to build your powerful deck to deal with difficult situations.

* Endless challenges
This game is no concept of complete, you can always take your deck deep into the dungeon and constantly break records.
